body: Hi mona, It works for me. But you can use another way to download weather files. Use "Ladybug Open EPW And STAT Weather Files" component and set weather files url to download that. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/5BmPB0O-KpSDVUKYdKztUip9FfR2HmaUzTcyOVk4OS7vhKIzhZ*mJ056SdxRcTiDsSgDytzR0i0giY2LUvXLsu79rjJCWYvy/455.PNG)  Like this weather url: [https://energyplus.net/weather-download/africa_wmo_region_1/EGY//EG...](https://energyplus.net/weather-download/africa_wmo_region_1/EGY//EGY_Helwan.623780_ETMY/all) ... [https://energyplus.net/weather](https://energyplus.net/weather) -Omid
